1.0.name: wordpress/bp-redirect-to-profile
1.0.description:
Bp Redirect to Profile is a plugin for buddypress +wpmu based site, which enables site admins to redirect users to their profile on login. It's simple and helps to provide a better user experience.

Features include:

  • Redirect all normal users to their profile on login
  • If the admin logs in from site front page,redirect him back to front page.
  • If the Site Admin logs in from site backend, i.e. using http://yoursite.com/wp-login.php, let him go to the wordpress dashboard
